description.value:
Even when impossible, you always have exactly what you need.

You can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Prescient Planner] even if you have already used it after purchasing goods, and you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Interact] to draw the item as a single action instead of a 2-action activity.

In addition, five times per day, you can use Prescient Planner to pull out a common consumable item up to 6 levels lower than your level.
